actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the last full calendar week in April of each year as National Secretaries Week.

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the last full calendar week in April in each year as "National Secretaries Week."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue a proclamation designating the last full calendar week in April of each year as National Secretaries Week.
